original_title: Ｍｒ．ジレンマン　色情狂い
overview: Kantaro Iwata's life is not a happy one, neither at the office where he is looked down upon, nor at home where he has a nagging wife and children who treat him with scorn. All these things pile up until he takes things into his own hands.
tagline: The masked protector of virgins! A modern day Galahad!
title: Masked Crusader, Mr. Jirenman
